attributes.action: instruct Hilary Benn to order a badger cull in the TB hot spots
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: we are very concerned about the welfare of badgers and cattle not to mention the wild deer population and feel that the only way forward is too remove the diseased badgers aswell as the diseased cattle.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "instruct Hilary Benn to order a badger cull in the TB hot spots."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page20995


Prime Minister's Office
